resources.string: \"There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle\".
\"Only those who risk going too far can possibly find out how far they can go\".
\"Live is either a daring adventure or it is nothing\".
\"We don\'t stop playing because we grow old, we grow old because we stop playing\".
\"enjoy live. this is not a dress rehearsal\"
\"The Chief danger in live is that you may take too many precautions\".
\"It is better to wear out than to rust out\"
\"Life like a mirror never gives back more than we put into it\".
\"and in the end it’s not the years in your life that count. it’s the life in your years\".
